title: Radiation Physics
description: Characteristics of atomic and nuclear radiations, transition probabilities, radioactivity, classical and quantum-mechanical derivations of cross sections, interactions of photon, neutron, and charged particles with matter.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 1502 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1512 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 15X2 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2231 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and NRE 2120 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
